channel.title: Legion's Realm
channel.description:
Hello there moparscapers :cool:, this is a new project i've been working on. I started this about 2 week ago. Been working on this on and off because im busy with more important stuff like my job and personal life. :)
I started this to bring back the old servers like dodian and others. I also wanted to bring back a server that acctually has an economy, where it was actually hard to get good items as a low level and not too easy as a high level. To basically bring back the challenge of a private server. So lets go own some lumby cows! :) Read more here - [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,439805.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,439805.0.html[/url]
[b]Some features:[/b] Loaded old school sprites Exp rate of 50 per hit. Fight caves 21 waves. (thinking about 63) Various skills are added. Shops are basic, nothing like whips and such in them. Moderate starter.
[b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rnbfoy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/291ma77.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/v8jxqv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/307lxti.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2u5csbp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n1rzg6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/25gvxn5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1z4k7za.png[/img]
Ill update this at the times im available and have chances too. Like i said, busy with other stuff this is like a side project of mine. Any ideas or suggestions of what you liked in the old servers, you can post below. Ill try add a little of everything that people liked.

item.title: Legion's Realm
item.dc:creator: @Elitobot Elitobot
item.description:
@Elitobot wrote:

The features look pretty good as far as I can see. I am looking forward to playing your server when you decide to release it, I have been looking for a challenge :).

Read full topic

all i see is a 317 deob?

item.title: Legion's Realm
item.dc:creator: @LegionOfDoom LegionOfDoom
item.description:
@LegionOfDoom wrote:

Hello there moparscapers ,
this is a new project i’ve been working on. I started this about
2 week ago. Been working on this on and off because im busy with
more important stuff like my job and personal life.

I started this to bring back the old servers like dodian and others. I also
wanted to bring back a server that acctually has an economy, where it
was actually hard to get good items as a low level and not too easy as a high level.
To basically bring back the challenge of a private server. So lets go own some lumby cows!
Read more here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,439805.0.html

Some features:
Loaded old school sprites
Exp rate of 50 per hit.
Fight caves 21 waves. (thinking about 63)
Various skills are added.
Shops are basic, nothing like whips and such in them.
Moderate starter.

Media:

2rnbfoy.png785×542







Ill update this at the times im available and have chances too. Like i said, busy with other stuff
this is like a side project of mine. Any ideas or suggestions of what you liked in the old servers,
you can post below. Ill try add a little of everything that people liked.
